title: Flipped Learning-Based Job-Related English Reading Proficiency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: A program focused on improving work-related English reading skills for working adult learners, applying flipped learning feasible in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment.

learning_goals: Learners can pre-study job-related English texts via smartphone-based digital materials and understand core concepts with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can analyze the logical structure of complex English sentences with 75% accuracy through in-class discussions and collaborative activities.
Learners can improve reading speed and accuracy by 15% weekly through formative assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
